sentence.Network_en: Whether by design or accident his timing was perfect.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管是计划好的还是巧合，他对时机的把握堪称完美。

sentence.Network_en: Is their timing right, or have they boobed again?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的时间掐得准吗？是不是他们又弄错了？

encyclopedia.content: 基本信息 歌曲名称：Timing 演唱组合：黑色饼干 歌曲作词：徐若瑄 歌曲作曲：中西圭三 & 小西贵雄 发行时间：1999年6月 歌曲语言：日语 发行公司：博德曼 歌曲歌词 慢慢地 越来越没有脾气 一旦一看不见你 I feel lonely, baby 为什么你一开口说说话 Happy 自动跑回来 气氛的改变真快 你时机太会抓 闷闷的心又密密麻麻 整个宇宙飞吧！ 都爱了你 不要面子也罢 街上的人们和我们一起 まわれまわる oh! Timing 幸福的力量 多不可

entry.def: Timing is the skill or action of judging the right moment in a situation or activity at which to do something.

example.ex: His photo is a wonderful happy moment caught with perfect timing...
example.tran: 他拍的照片时机掌握完美，记录下了动人的快乐瞬间。

example.ex: If your timing is right, you may be fortunate enough to stumble across a village fiesta.
example.tran: 如果你时机把握得好，你会幸运地撞上某个乡村节日。

entry.def: Timing is used to refer to the time at which something happens or is planned to happen, or to the length of time that something takes.

example.ex: The timing of the minister's visit, however, could somewhat detract from the goodwill it's supposed to generate.
example.tran: 但是，部长访问的时间安排不当，可能会使访问的善意不能得到有效传达。

auth_sentence.content: The timing of Ramadan is dependent on the moon.
auth_sentence.res_content: The timing of Ramadan is dependent on the moon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The timing of Ramadan is dependent on the moon.

auth_sentence.content: I was really disturbed about the timing of this.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was really disturbed about the timing of this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was really disturbed about the timing of this.

auth_sentence.content: The timing was lovely in the case of Rhys.
auth_sentence.res_content: The timing was lovely in the case of Rhys.

sentences.en: The timing of the gun was precisely synchronized with the turning of the plane’s propeller.
sentences.cn: 风门的调速与飞机螺旋桨的转动精确同步。

sentences.en: From him I learned that a good politician is marked to great extent by his sense of timing.
sentences.cn: 从他那儿我懂得,一个能干的政治家在很大程度上在于审时度势。

means.word_mean: 体育运动员把握时机的能力

sentences.en: He has the split-second timing all good players need.
sentences.cn: 他具有所有优秀运动员所需要的分秒不差地把握时机的本领。

sentences.en: The bowler judged it well, timing the ball to perfection.
sentences.cn: 投球手判断准确，对球速的掌握恰到好处。

means.word_mean: 时间的选择(或安排)；时机掌握

sentences.en: His timing when he volleys is so good.
sentences.cn: 他截击空中球的时机掌握得很好。

sentences.en: The timing of the meeting is not convenient.
sentences.cn: 会议的时间安排不合适。
